website_summaries.verdict: An impressive set, loaded with action features and surprises that will delight fans of all ages.
pros: Recreate the attack on the Avengers from within by Ultron
Tower is more than 14" high and folds out for easy play
5 mini-figures include Iron Man and Thor
cons: Very expensive, and probably best for older Avengers fans

customer_reviews.title: This is a really intricate set. Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: It is a really intricate set and was fun to put together. I think that this set was my favorite. Each time I check it out I find new features (hidden compartments and weapons) just like you would expect. It is a little short, but it is not tiny. I am glad that I read reviews before purchasing because I was expecting something much smaller and was pleasantly surprised by the height :) I would definitely recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old's dream
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loves this Avengers tower! Could it be bigger? Sure, but what Lego set wouldn't be better if it were bigger or contained more Legos? We purchased it as a toy for my son to use to learn how to build and follow directions fully expecting him to knock it over and have to put it back together again. It has fulfilled all of our expectations and provided hours and hours of imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Super Hero Set
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING Lego set! One of our favorites that we have ever gotten. So many fun features to the Lego building; from the hidden jet to the pop out windows, this Lego set is really filled with fun little features. The hinged tower opens up to reveal 6 separate areas all filled with their own interactive features. This set was truly well with the price and has provided endless hours of play consistently since we gave it to my son a month ago. Added bonus, it is shown multiple times on the Lego Avengers Video Game which makes it even more exciting for my son! Lego hit it out of the park with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love us some LEGOS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love LEGOS and this was so much fun to build!!! We loved putting together all the levels.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mayle

customer_reviews.title: stickers are a pain
customer_reviews.text: looks very cool but the stickers were a pain in the rear ---- especially on the part that folds --- build that part first, then do the stickers --ignore the sticker instructions and use common sense
customer_reviews.author: Brian Greve

customer_reviews.title: A Super Heroic Tower of Super Powers!
customer_reviews.text: This is a 3 floor tower with a 3rd floor balcony and you can launch a secret drone from the roof top! What's not to love about this set? It comes with Thor and Iron Man/Tony Stark plus 3 "bad guy" robots/suits (maybe 2 of the white robots are good guys but when you're playing with them they can be anyone/anything!). The choice of blue windows, instead of clear ones, was a great choice because it really goes well with the gray bricks. I really recommend this fun tower for all of the architecture and Avengers/Super hero lovers out there!
customer_reviews.author: Brett TTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set, thought my 9 year old had trouble ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set, thought my 9 year old had trouble building it alone. The windows kept falling out. He builds a lot of lego sets alone, so I was surprised by his inability to complete this one on his own. It is really nice once it's built though and he loves having it.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy to 5 little peanuts

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure if I love this more than my son
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I love this more than my son, but he received this for Christmas and still plays with it on a regular basis. Has so many little compartments and movable items, and it opens up to play inside the tower. Absolutely my son's favorite toy right now.
customer_reviews.author: Miss E

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery. Nothing wrong with item.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our 8 year old. It arrived as promised, next day. Everything was good with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Hajduk

customer_reviews.title: Really fun build with a few fun play features
customer_reviews.text: Managed to grab this while it was $35. Really fun build with a few fun play features. Really hoping to see these back around $50 so I can combine a few more sets for a larger tower.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.text: The tower itself has so many different rooms and activities, that this build will keep you (or you and your child, in our case) busy for hours. Easily incorporated into play with other sets, and enough spare parts floating around to keep a cat happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Lego set I have purchased!
customer_reviews.text: My children love Legos and I have bought a ton! This is by far the best one I have purchased. You can actually play with it and isn't the typical Lego set that ends up in 100 pieces all over the floor or in the Lego storage box. I highly recommend this one. My son who is 7 had no trouble putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great set from Lego
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 5 year on his birthday. He'd been obsessing over it for months. He put it together by himself over the course of 2 days. All pieces were there and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Vampa

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: The lego's came on time and in great shape. It was a 7th birthday gift for my son and he loved it. It has 2 booklets of directions and took him and I an hour to put together but it was great mother/son bonding time! He did most of the work himself with me being QA! He plays with this Lego set and his others and has great time using his imagination. We are all happy with this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Deal on amazon! Love love this set, one of the best lego super heroe set I would said, the spider man on bridge one is not good too, but this set is certainly a great value, worth buying it

product_meta.title: LEGO Super Heroes Attack on Avengers Tower 76038
product_meta.description: The Heroes are having a party when suddenly Avengers Tower comes under Ultron attack from the inside! Evil Ultron Mark 1 has assembled himself in the lab and is exploding out the windows. Help Iron Man and Thor to defeat Ultron Mark 1 and the 2 Iron Legion accomplices under his control. Make plans in the JARVIS control room and treat injured Super Heroes in the sick bay. An Iron Legion is blasting out the doors and windows of the ground-floor robot bay. The other has stolen the Loki Scepter from the analysis lab so pursue him with Thor and take aim from the roof of the tower with the secret hidden drone and stud shooters. You must retrieve the Scepter and stop Ultron Mark 1! Includes 5 minifigures with a weapon and assorted accessories: Ultron Mark 1, 2 Iron Legions, Iron Man and Thor.
feature_bullets: Features a fold-out function for easy play, robot bay with fire extinguisher, lab with robotic arms, JARVIS control room with hidden weapon, lounge, sick bay with stretcher, analysis lab with the Loki Scepter
Includes 5 minifigures with a weapon and assorted accessories: Ultron Mark 1, 2 Iron Legions, Iron Man and Thor

Also features top tower with secret hidden drone with 2 stud shooters, 2 roof stud shooters, doors, windows and a balcony with hidden stud shooters, 2 wine glasses, doctor's needle and explode function
Accessories include a Super Jumper and thrusters for Ultron Mark 1, the Iron Legions and Iron Man, plus a wig for Iron Man and Thor's hammer
Measures over 14” (37cm) high, 7” (19cm) wide and 4” (11cm) deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars219 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
